lines.text: What's wrong with me?
Nothing. You're just a little pregnant.
It's a boy!
[disguised as Dan Jordan]
Kids... always a disappointment.
The bottom line, Alice, if anybody's trying to hurt you, supernatural or not, they're going to have to go through us first.
All of us. Right?
That's what I'm afraid of.

[possessed by Freddy Krueger]
Hi, Alice. Want to make babies?
[laughs]
[Freddy is cutting chunks out of Greta and eating them]
Is she delicious or am I crazy?
You leave her alone!
Aren't you eating?
I really don't feel up to it.
Really, dear. You ought to try something.
You're the one whose always slapping my hand about my weight, *Mother*.
That's why we diet, dear. So we can eat at social events and not upset the other guests!
Tell you what. Why don't I just eat the whole goddamn tray, go throw up and come back for seconds, all right?
All right, Krueger... this time it's for keeps!
Your birth was a curse on the whole of humanity.
[Freddy hisses]
I will not allow it to happen again. You brought me back to give you life, but now I must take yours.
We'll see, bitch. We'll just see.
And as adults, we must now prepare for our new life outside this wonderful environment known as Springwood High. So let's blow this pop stand!
Hey, Mark! Picture time! Come get immortalized, parents and brats.
[laughs]

[excitedly]
Greta! Photo opportunity, dear!
Damn it, they caught me. I have to gnash my teeth for the paparazzi.

[singing]
... seven, eight, better stay awake. Nine, ten, he's back again.

[Interrupts Yvonne and Alice's argument and shows them the files under his arm]
He found a lot more people before he found us.
You, too?

[Holds up his scarred palm to her]
He invited me to his house last night.
Jacob! Jacob! Alice will not triumph! Only you can help her now.

[looking like Freddy]
Hey, leave her! Let's go! I want to learn stuff from you. She's no fun anymore. Teach me? Heh.
Now, Jacob. Unleash the power he has given you.

[looking back at Freddy after he sees that he has fallen into Amanda's trap]
School's out, Krueger.
How was the meeting?
Sobering.
Very funny.
One of my friends died yesterday, Mother. Do you mind if I take a few hours off to remember him?
But we're having a party, dear.
Why don't you shut up and let her talk? I mean two of us have died in the past two days. Does that just strike you as particularly normal?
Sweet dreams, Jacob Daniel.
[seconds after fuel pump stabs into Dan's leg]
Fuel injection!

[on the radio]
I'm calling about my wayward ex-son Daniel who's been acting like an ungrateful, unmanageable dickweed ever since he was seduced by that bimbo slut whore Alice!
Mom?

[on the radio]
If I were you, lady, I'd kill the ungrateful piggy.

[In French accent]
Madam, if I may.
[locks Greta in seat]
Bon appÈtit...
[accent dies]
... bitch.

[seeing someone cut their hand on a beer bottle]
God, I could have gone all night without looking at that.
You know, I think it's very strange how you draw your comics loaded with blood and guts. That freaks you out.
Yeah, it's just a little blood, guy.
I know what it is, you big, dumb jock.
Hey, Danny, better not dream and drive.
I like you. I want to stay with you. How come you don't like me?
Who said I didn't like you?
My friend with the funny hand.

[as The Phantom Prowler]
Time to die, you scar-faced limp-dick.
[fires a bunch of times until Freddy changes]
Faster than a bastard maniac! More powerful than a loco-madman! It's... Super Freddy!
[changes back to normal, turns Mark into paper and slashes him]
Told you comic books was bad for ya!
I'm your friend, Jacob. Just like a daddy. Heh, huh. Gootchy-gootchy-goo! Gootchy, gootchy, goo! I gotcha! I gotcha! I gotcha. I gotcha.
[grunts, Alice walks in]
Mommy, meet my friend.

[shows his torn up body]
Nice try, Alice. Thanks, babe. It's my new look. Like it?
Yee-haw! This boy feels the need for speed.
Put your pedal to the metal, Dan!
[laughs]

[commenting on the taste of Dan Jordan's champagne]
Bad year, Dan!
Filet de Barbie!
Where are you going, piglet? The party's just starting.
I know exactly what you're up to.
I thought I was up to... Yvonne!
[Lifts Yvonne from water, by her hair]
[Screams and punches Freddy]

[Lamenting the fact that he never told Greta he loved her when she was alive]
The Phantom Prowler wouldn't have been afraid to tell her how he felt. If I only had a tenth of his guts. Jesus, he's not even real, and he's more of a human being than I am.
Girl, what's wrong? Let's see a smile on your face.
I had kind of a long night.
Dan keeping you up again? Girl, you better put a lock on that window.
The Dan part was nice.
Sister, this is one of God's creatures. Take solace in that.
That is no creature of God!
You can't come back! I locked the door on you.
Well, I found the key!

[to Alice]
Just don't ask me to take a Jacuzzi with that guy again.

[During Greta's dream after, Freddy cuts the doll open]
Nothing but the best for Greta!

[Dressed as a waiter, brings a platter to Greta]
Bon appetit, bitch!

[Putting, the food in Greta's mouth]
Open wide!

[Freddy, stuffing food in Greta's mouth]
Second helping!
Don't talk, with your mouthful, dear!
You are, what you eat!
[laughs maniacally]
Greta, dear, it's time to get your beauty sleep! You don't want bags under those beautiful eyes!
